fields.description: As of 4.4 some administrative actions are proxied to the cloud controller ( EUCA-12926 ). In some cases failure or unavailability of the cloud controller can lead to errors: {code} # euserv-describe-services --debug 2016-12-20 16:27:27,052 DEBUG DescribeServices parsed arguments from CLI: fields.summary: Admin services should allow for cloud controller unavailable

comments.body: We now return a "Service not available" response when this failure occurs.
Seeing Service not available when CLC is down.
Moving 4.4.0 Issues from Release Pending to Resolved
